byline.contributor: Thomas Kaplan and Emmarie Huetteman contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Democrats pressed Mr. Price, the nominee for health and human services secretary, on ethics and the Affordable Care Act, but his support from Republicans is solid.
snippet: Democrats pressed Mr. Price, the nominee for health and human services secretary, on ethics and the Affordable Care Act, but his support from Republicans is solid....

headline.main: Tom Price’s Heated Hearing Is Unlikely to Derail His Nomination
headline.print_headline: Heated Hearing for Health Nominee Is Unlikely to Derail His Confirmation
